title: Create a busybox pod that runs `i=0; while true; do echo "$i: $(date)"; i=$((i+1)); sleep 1; done`. Check its logs
description: Create a busybox pod that runs `i=0; while true; do echo "$i: $(date)"; i=$((i+1)); sleep 1; done`. Check its logs

steps: 1. kubectl run busybox --image=busybox --restart=Never -- /bin/sh -c 'i=0; while true; do echo "$i: $(date)"; i=$((i+1)); sleep 1; done'
2. kubectl logs busybox -f # follow the logs
